sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"医生"之意。
means: doctor ： 普通用词，泛指各科医生，即一切有行医资格的人。
physician ： 指医院的内科医生。
surgeon ： 指专修外科或专修人体某个部分的外科专科医生，这种医生一般需对患者进行手术治疗。
dentist ： 指专门从事治牙的医生。

word_mean: 医师：从医学院或骨病学院(college of osteopathy)毕业、得到有关部门发给的执照、被认可从事医疗工作的人，另见doctor

sentence.Network_en: I'm a practicing physician trying to help people here and now.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是一名此时此刻只想治病救人的执业医师。

sentence.Network_en: I committed the physician's cardinal sin: I got involved with my patients.
sentence.Network_cn: 我犯了从医的大忌：跟病人有了感情纠葛。

sentence.Network_en: Broussais was the first physician to use leeches as a cure-all.
sentence.Network_cn: 布鲁赛是第一个把水蛭当成万灵药的医生。

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)before attempting to correct others, make sure that you aren't guilty of the same faults yourself

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French fisicien, based on Latin physica 'things relating to nature' (see physic)

entry.tran: （正式美国英语或过时英国英语中的）医生，内科医生
entry.def: In formal American English or old-fashioned British English, a physician is a doctor.

sentences.sentence: "I felt so bad I went to see my doctor"

stems_affixes.word_buile: physic医学, 医术+ian人→n.医师, 内科医师

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物理学者, 唯物论者
stems_affixes.word_buile: physic自然,物理+ist信仰者,专家→n.物理学者, 唯物论者
physi自然,物理+ics学科,学术→physics物理学

sentences.cn: 他是位著名的(内科)医生。

sentences.en: In case of diabetes, physicians advise against the use of sugar.
sentences.cn: 对于糖尿病患者, 医生告诫他们不要吃糖。

jushi.english: In case of diabetes, physicians advise against the use of sugar.
